reviews.customers_say: Customers find the shrug cardigan to be a nice quality chiffon piece that works well as a cover-up, particularly over sleeveless dresses. They appreciate its light, elegant fabric and sheer design that provides modesty while not being too see-through. The shrug fits well, with one customer noting it hits above the waist, and customers find it flattering, with one mentioning it flatters sleeveless dresses and tops. Wh

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECT FIT & COLOR!
items.body: LOVE the khaki color. The fit was perfect. This does NOT run small. If anything, it's true to size or may run a teeny bit on the large size. I wear an XL to 2XL depending on tops & jackets. In this, the XL fit perfectly!! The color complements the dress I was hoping to pair it with. It will work well. Granted, this looks darker beige in natural, outdoor lighting and lighter in color indoors. That's the same with anything and I'm including a picture so you can see the difference. Granted, colors on monitors and phones often look different as well. Since this is chiffon, it of course may be wrinkled when you receive it - but that's normal for chiffon. Chiffon wrinkles in packing easily, but is soft and airy - perfect for warm weather as well as any dressy event indoors . This covers your arms if you want a bit of coverage and honestly, I could pull this totally closed if I wanted to clip it with something, but I don't - just saying, there is plenty of fabric. I feel this is well worth the cost and exactly what I need for a wedding in South Florida! Read more
items.author: Signe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect
items.body: This was the perfect little piece to wear over a formal gown to cover my upper arms. Very light and did not make me feel too warm. Worn to a summer wedding, so I was not looking for anything that would make me too warm. I purchased one in navy blue and one in black, and I will definitely wear these again. The price was also very reasonable and I used a garment steamer on each one and they came out beautiful. Read more
items.author: Suzanne

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars light weight
items.body: works great with a sleeveless dress, lite weight great style Read more
items.author: Rob Bob

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good color and right size
items.body: I liked the pink color and the size was quite right and fit (Size L). I received lots of compliments for my outfit on the day of the party so am going to keep it to cover the arms. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s nice.
items.body: It was incredibly wrinkled when I got it out of bag it was packaged. I ironed it with a cotton cloth on top so the iron wouldn’t burn a hole in it. Looked really nice and kept its form the entire time I wore it which was most of the day. It’s ‘nice’. In the closet it wrinkles but I guess that might be normal for a bolero that light. It’s not particularly stunning but it’s not ugly either. Just ‘nice’. I hope it stays intact for a year. Had to get a large size because it seems to run smaller, at least for my measurements which usually are small to medium. Read more
items.author: Amanda Gilbert

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cover up
items.body: Absolutely perfect to cover my arms up after the wedding I was in. I wore it the entire reception and it was flattering and comfortable. It steamed well, too. I took my steamer to get the creases out. Highly recommend for a wedding! I ordered a large and have chubby arms and it fit perfectly. Read more
items.author: Kristin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loose fit
items.body: Quality is good. Good stitching. Expected opacity / material thinness. Slightly scratchy (also expected). It's a bit big on me, but I kind of expected that with a medium. My shoulder span is 17", I'm a 32a. A medium usually fits my shoulders. A small or extra small usually fits my bust. The cut is loose, and would work well for larger arms or sleeves, but I have difficulty getting it to stay in place; it keeps falling off my shoulders if it's not pinned down. Read more
items.author: E. M.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic to cover upper arms in tanks and sleeveless dresses/shirts.
items.body: Love this!! I lost a lot of weight and my arms have very saggy skin. This is perfect to cover that for my summer tank tops and dresses. It's so sheer and lightweight so it feels like you are wearing nothing. I believe it had multiple colors but of course I always usually get black. And as much as I love this I may order more in other colors. I do not wear short sleeves unless it comes to my elbow to cover the saggy skin. This does that without feeling like I'm wearing anything. I'm so pleased with the fit, feel, and price. Read more
items.author: Beth

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A-white, White Blue Print, A-black, Black Small Floral, Navy Blue, Caramel Brown, Blue Tie Dye, Dark Green, Blue Flower, Blue Yellow Print, White Purple Print, Wine Red, Black Rye Flower, Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
